summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Seattle Department of Parks and Recreation authorizing a grant agreement with the Institute of Museum Services (IMS) for a 1993-1994 General Operating Support Grant for the Woodland Park Zoo; authorizing an amendment to the annual agreement with the Woodland Park Zoological Society; creating positions; increasing the expenditure allowances in the 1994 departmental budget, and making a reimbursable appropriation from the Park Fund therefor.
